short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will automatically start the ticket timer within Zoho Desk.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will automatically start the timer on ZohoDesk when viewing an unclosed ticket. For anyone who needs to track time on tickets but always forgets to start the timer. The timer will start when you create a new ticket or view an open one. If you stop the timer it wont start again until you reload the page, either by reloading or navigating away and then back again.
